title: Bug 13561[Navigator] Single click in the Navigator doesn't bringtofront already open Editor
description: If I singleclick in the Packages View, it will flip pages for me in theEditorPane.singleclick in Navigator does not do this.Also, the Preference "link navigator to selection" seems like it might be howyou enable this, but it backwards.It moves the selection in the Navigatorbased on the active Editor.This has the effect of autoexpanding and losingyour place in the ResourceNavigator.
